content:
Could anyone take a look at this PR #19435?
Do I need to make any further changes?
Thanks.

If you have addressed all the comments from Yaël, you should click on "resolve conversation" on each one (if you feel that the conversation is resolved). Then you should remove the awaiting-author label. This will make the PR show up on the #queue again and make it easier for reviewers to see the current status of it.
Oh, that's a bit awkward :joy: . I'm not very familiar with the process yet. Thank you for your reply!
Would anyone be able to review my recent commits? I’d really appreciate your feedback.
Thanks for your reviews. I've resolved all feedback for this PR. Could someone please take a look and merge it if everything looks good?
Also, I've also worked on other equality conditions recently (some may depend on the newly added theorems) - should I add them in the current PR or submit them as a new PR after this is merged?
I left a few comments on the PR. Please don't add new material to your PR once the review process has got under way; you can make new PR's for that later.
